author: tersec
content:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.5.0-alpha.10/specs/deneb/p2p-interface.md#blob_sidecar_subnet_id says
> ###### `blob_sidecar_{subnet_id}`
> 
> *[New in Deneb:EIP4844]*
> 
> This topic is used to propagate blob sidecars, where each blob index maps to some `subnet_id`.
> 
> The following validations MUST pass before forwarding the `blob_sidecar` on the network, assuming the alias `block_header = blob_sidecar.signed_block_header.message`:
> 
> - _[REJECT]_ The sidecar's index is consistent with `MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK` -- i.e. `blob_sidecar.index < MAX_BLOBS_PER_BLOCK`.

and nothing in https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/v1.5.0-alpha.10/specs/electra/p2p-interface.md seems to update it?

author: tersec
content: i.e. as written blobs number 6, 7, and 8 will be rejected at gossip by a conforming Pectra client even if otherwise allowed

content:

author: tbenr
content:
one useful info: if you are running kurtosis with an M4 and Sequoia 15.2, teku image crashes due to some jvm problems. The workaround is to add `-XX:UseSVE=0` param like:
```
cl_extra_env_vars: {"JAVA_OPTS": "-Xmx4G -XX:UseSVE=0"}
```
